title: Idols winner Yanga Sobetwa speaks out on why she missed her matric exams this year
text:
Idols winner Yanga Sobetwa speaks out on why she missed her matric exams this year share this

Idols SA season 14 winner Yanga will not be writing her matric exams with the class of 2019 because of her immensely busy schedule.

Read More: Idols SA winner Yanga Sobetwa releases her debut music video with Amanda Black

Following reports that she “regrets not writing her matric exams this year”, Yanga took to her Twitter page to clarify that she never said or implied that she has any regrets about putting her studies on hold.
description: Idols SA season 14 winner Yanga will not be writing her matric exams with the class of 2019 because of her immensely busy schedule.
